title: Fix blank Cases list regression on Dashboard and Cases pages

requirements.text: Restore Cases data rendering on the Dashboard page so that surgery cases fetched from the backend canister display correctly, matching the behavior from version 93. The fix must ensure the React Query hook result is properly wired to the component's rendering logic without altering any backend calls.

quotes: Cases are not loading in the app
Blank list is loading on both the Cases and Dashboard pages

acceptanceCriteria: The Dashboard page displays the full list of surgery cases returned by the backend canister
No empty list is shown when cases exist in the backend
No error messages or console errors appear related to case loading
The fix does not modify any backend Motoko code

requirements.text: Restore Cases data rendering on the Cases list page (CasesListView) so that surgery cases fetched from the backend canister display correctly, matching the behavior from version 93. Inspect and repair any broken prop passing, query result destructuring, or data mapping introduced by the UI refactor between v93 and v95 (specifically changes related to WorkflowIcon.tsx, CaseCard.tsx, ChecklistEditor.tsx, and useQueries.ts).

quotes: Cases are not loading in the app
Blank list is loading on both the Cases and Dashboard pages

acceptanceCriteria: The Cases page displays the full list of surgery cases returned by the backend canister
No empty list is shown when cases exist in the backend
CaseCard components render correctly with case data including workflow task icons
ChecklistEditor receives and renders the correct task data per case
No error messages or console errors appear related to case loading
The fix does not modify any backend Motoko code

constraints: Do not modify any backend Motoko code
Do not change the data fetching logic in the backend canister interface
Immutable frontend paths (useInternetIdentity.ts, useActor.ts, main.tsx, components/ui) must not be edited
nonGoals: Adding new features or UI changes beyond restoring the case list display
Changing the visual design or workflow icons introduced in v94/v95
Modifying backend data models or CRUD operations
